courseDetails.title: Generative AI for Content Production and Multimedia Campaign
courseDetails.shortDescription: Generative AI Video & Content Production: Scripts, Voiceovers, Talking-Head AI & Editing
courseDetails.longDescription:
Use the power of generative AI to produce real, professional-quality multimedia content and complete campaign assets even if you’re new to AI usage.

In this hands-on, step-by-step course you’ll learn how to use cutting-edge AI tools to create scripts, voiceovers, videos, and visuals for a full multimedia campaign from start to finish. We take you beyond theory into practical, real-world application so you graduate with actual deliverables you can use.

You’ll begin by mastering scriptwriting with Gemini, learning how to prompt and iterate so that your video concepts are compelling and aligned with your goals. Then you’ll use ElevenLabs to generate natural, human-like voiceovers that bring your scripts to life. Next, you’ll learn how to craft talking-head AI videos using TopView, and how to build dynamic campaign footage with tools like Whisk/Veo 3.1.

Throughout the course you’ll also get practical lessons on polishing your assets with Canva for graphics and CapCut for video editing. You’ll learn how to structure, export, and prepare your content for publishing on platforms like YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, and beyond.

What You’ll Learn

• Generate effective, AI-driven scripts using Gemini
• Produce high-quality, natural voiceovers with ElevenLabs
• Create and edit talking-head AI videos using TopView
• Build dynamic visuals and media assets that support your campaign
• Integrate AI content into polished, publishable video formats
• Apply best practices for publishing, sharing and distributing AI video content

This course is designed for creators, marketers, entrepreneurs, social media managers, and anyone eager to gain practical, job-ready skills in generative AI content production and real campaign workflows. You don’t need prior experience with AI tools — just a passion to learn and create.

Tools You’ll Use

Gemini, ElevenLabs, TopView, Whisk/Veo, and CapCut.

By the end of this class, you’ll be able to confidently produce a complete talking-head AI video and understand how to take AI-generated outputs and turn them into polished media assets ready for audience engagement and distribution. This course equips you with scalable workflows and practical techniques you can apply to real campaigns and client projects.
targetAudiences: Beginners and intermediate creators who want real-world skills in generative AI content production.
Marketers, social media managers and brand builders seeking to produce campaign media faster.
Entrepreneurs and small business owners looking to create professional videos without a production team.
Anyone curious about using AI tools to write scripts, generate voiceovers, and make dynamic videos.

courseDetails.title: Frazzled to Focused: Master Energy & Attention Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: Maximize your attention to boost productivity, well-being, and meaningful accomplishment — and finally beat burnout.
courseDetails.longDescription:
If your attention span now resembles a TikTok reel, you’re not alone.

In an era of unprecedented distraction and attentional demands, we’ve evolved into something new: Homo Distractus — the distracted human.

The modern workday has become a digitally draining storm of meetings, social media binges, tabs, notifications, and rapid context shifts, leaving periods of real focus on the critically endangered list.

Productivity is suffering. Despite working longer and faster, we’re accomplishing less.

And the cost goes far beyond output: chronic distraction and divided attention is damaging our health, draining our energy, elevating stress, and pushing many into burnout.

In this landscape, the ability to focus is no longer just helpful — it’s a superpower. Reclaiming your attention may be the single most valuable skill you can build today.

When you consider that most people are operating in a state of ongoing distraction and attention overload, there is a major opportunity to stand out and build a truly successful life. In other words, it’s never been easier to be extraordinary. In a world drowning in distraction, the smallest edge in focus becomes a game-changing advantage, setting you far apart from the distracted masses.

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

“The only factor becoming scarce in a world of abundance is human attention.” — Kevin Kelly

This holistic and transformative course addresses the major problem plaguing our productivity and well-being: divided attention. Representing a distillation of high-impact insights across multiple fields, this course will equip you with actionable knowledge and tools to help you develop attentional agency in a distracted world. Whether you're a professional seeking peak performance or an individual yearning for balance, this course is your guide to finding your focus.

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

This course rests on two primary pillars: attention management and energy management.

Attention Management - The ability to direct attention with intention and manage the demands placed upon it.

Energy Management - The ability to sustainably spend and restore energy in pursuit of your goals.

Together, these interrelated skills form the foundation for high performance and sustainable success.
WHY?

  • You need energy to fuel attention, and attention to direct and use your energy wisely.

  • Without high-quality energy, attention is underpowered. And without high-quality attention, energy is wasted or used ineffectively.

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

This course will challenge your existing beliefs about work, productivity, and success by putting forward an entirely new work philosophy designed around the science of optimal cognitive performance and health: Productivity 2.0. As part of these efforts to integrate this new philosophy into your life you will be required to step out of the frame of the busy worker-bee and zoom out to adopt the role of the intelligent designer who has the power, and desire, to bring about revolutionary change.

——————————————————————————————————————————————————————————

This course is not about squeezing out more productivity from your already busy day like an automaton. Instead, the course is geared to help you attain greater focus and health, which as a byproduct, will make you more productive and fulfilled.

This isn’t another surface-level productivity course telling you to hide your phone or silence notifications. It’s a comprehensive framework that tackles both the external forces (social media, communication overload, workspace design, meetings) and the internal patterns (mind-wandering, stress, self-distraction) that fragment focus. It’s designed for you—the knowledge worker—one of the billion-plus humans doing cognitively demanding work in a world engineered to fracture and steal your focus.

Attention is the substance of your life, and your greatest asset—learn to sharpen and spend it wisely.

And if you feel like you don’t have the time or attention for this course, that’s the biggest sign you need it.
targetAudiences: This course is designed for knowledge workers—that is, anyone who relies on their powers of focus to create value. If you work at a computer to solve problems, generate ideas, or bring value to information, you’re part of this group—alongside more than a billion others.

Businesses who want to enhance the focus and performance of their workforce. In a time of unprecedented distraction and attentional demands, it's imperative for organizations to train and protect the primary resource of the modern age—Attention Capital.
Any human living through our age of hyper-distractibility and burnout.

This will help in developing as a corporate person and become a better manager.


Management learning is critically important for both companies and individual managers, as it plays a pivotal role in achieving organizational success, fostering leadership skills, and advancing individual careers. Here's why management learning is significant for companies and managers:


For Companies:

Enhanced Productivity and Efficiency: Effective management practices help streamline workflows, allocate resources efficiently, and optimize processes. When managers are well-versed in management principles, companies can operate more productively, leading to cost savings and improved profitability.


Innovation and Adaptability: In a rapidly changing business environment, companies must continuously innovate and adapt. Management learning equips managers with the tools and knowledge to foster a culture of innovation and navigate through evolving market conditions.


Employee Engagement and Retention: Skilled managers can create a positive work environment, motivate employees, and build strong teams. This leads to higher employee engagement and lower turnover rates, reducing recruitment and training costs for the company.


Strategic Decision-Making: Management education provides managers with the ability to make informed, data-driven decisions. Strategic thinking and decision-making skills are essential for achieving long-term business goals.


Conflict Resolution and Communication: Effective communication and conflict resolution are vital in any organization. Managers with management training are better equipped to handle conflicts, promote teamwork, and maintain a harmonious workplace.


Risk Management: Companies face various risks, from financial to operational and reputational. Management learning helps managers identify, assess, and mitigate these risks, ensuring the company's stability and sustainability.


Customer Satisfaction: Managers with a deep understanding of management principles are more likely to focus on customer needs and satisfaction. This customer-centric approach can lead to increased loyalty and revenue.


For Managers:

Career Advancement: Management learning is crucial for career growth. Employers often prioritize candidates with management education and experience when filling leadership positions.


Leadership Development: Management education enhances leadership skills, including decision-making, problem-solving, and team management. These skills are transferable and valuable throughout one's career.


Increased Confidence: Managers who undergo management training gain confidence in their abilities. This confidence translates into better leadership and a greater capacity to handle challenging situations.


Networking Opportunities: Management courses and programs often facilitate networking with peers and industry experts. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new opportunities and insights.


Personal Growth: Management learning is not only about career advancement but also personal growth. It encourages self-reflection, self-improvement, and a better understanding of one's strengths and weaknesses.


Adaptation to Change: In today's dynamic business world, the ability to adapt to change is essential. Management education equips managers with the skills to thrive in uncertain and evolving environments.


Job Satisfaction: Effective management leads to more successful teams and projects, which can result in greater job satisfaction for managers. A fulfilling career is often linked to the ability to manage and lead effectively.


In conclusion, management learning is vital for both companies and managers. It empowers organizations to operate efficiently, innovate, and achieve their goals while providing managers with the tools and knowledge needed for career growth, personal development, and effective leadership. A strong foundation in management principles benefits everyone involved and contributes to long-term success.
targetAudiences: Professionals with any background who wants to upgrade management skills

courseDetails.title: Liberté et Efficacité : vivre du minimalisme en voyageant
courseDetails.shortDescription: L’art du voyage minimaliste : libère-toi pour explorer le monde !
courseDetails.longDescription:
Et si tu pouvais voyager plus souvent, travailler depuis n’importe où et vivre avec plus de légèreté ? Ce cours te guide pas à pas pour adopter un mode de vie minimaliste qui te permet de te concentrer sur l’essentiel : la liberté, la créativité et l’équilibre.


Tu apprendras à réduire le superflu, à organiser ton espace de travail mobile et à créer un rythme de vie fluide, que tu sois à la maison, en déplacement ou à l’étranger. L’objectif est simple : te libérer du poids des possessions, du stress logistique et des routines rigides pour redécouvrir le plaisir de voyager et de travailler avec clarté.


Ce cours t’aidera à :

  • Voyager plus léger, plus libre et plus souvent.

  • Travailler efficacement, peu importe où tu te trouves.

  • Simplifier ton quotidien pour retrouver motivation et énergie.

  • Adopter un état d’esprit minimaliste qui favorise la sérénité et la productivité.


À travers une méthode claire et accessible, tu découvriras comment repenser ton mode de vie, planifier tes déplacements intelligemment et créer une activité professionnelle alignée avec tes valeurs.


À la fin du cours, tu auras une vision concrète et réaliste du business voyage minimaliste et les outils nécessaires pour vivre autrement, avec moins d’encombrement et plus de liberté.


Commence dès aujourd’hui à construire un mode de vie simple, équilibré et tourné vers l’essentiel.
targetAudiences: Tu veux voyager léger tout en travaillant efficacement depuis n’importe où.
Tu rêves d’une vie nomade, mais tu ne sais pas comment t’organiser pour que ce soit durable et agréable.
Tu ressens le besoin de simplifier ta vie, de te libérer du superflu et de te concentrer sur l’essentiel.
Tu cherches à concilier liberté, productivité et équilibre personnel.
Tu es freelance, entrepreneur, créateur ou salarié à distance, et tu veux que chaque voyage soit une source d’énergie plutôt qu’un fardeau.

courseDetails.title: The Beginner's Guide to Bash Scripting and Automation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Empower Yourself with Bash Scripting: A Comprehensive Journey into Automation for Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "The Beginner's Guide to Bash Scripting and Automation," a comprehensive course designed to empower you with essential skills in Bash scripting and command-line automation. Whether you're a programming novice, a system administrator, or simply eager to enhance your command-line proficiency, this course is your gateway to unlocking the potential of Bash.

What You Will Learn:

1. Foundations of Bash Scripting:

  • We'll start with the basics, guiding you through the essential elements of Bash scripting. From writing your first "Hello, World!" script to understanding variables and data types, you'll build a solid foundation for scripting mastery.

2. Control Structures and Logic:

  • Explore the power of control structures with if statements, making your scripts responsive to various conditions. Learn efficient looping techniques to iterate through tasks seamlessly.

3. Functions and Modular Scripting:

  • Delve into the world of functions, discovering how to organize your code for reusability and maintainability. Master the art of creating modular scripts that adapt to diverse requirements.

4. Interaction and Input/Output:

  • Elevate your scripts by learning how to interact with users through input mechanisms and provide meaningful output. Enhance the user experience within your scripts.

5. File and Directory Manipulation:

  • Uncover the capabilities of Bash in managing files and directories. Script your way through tasks involving organization, navigation, and manipulation of your file system.

6. Text Processing with Awk and Sed:

  • Dive into advanced text processing using Awk and Sed, powerful tools for manipulating and transforming text within your scripts.

7. Flexibility with Command-Line Arguments:

  • Make your scripts more dynamic by understanding how to accept command-line arguments, enhancing the flexibility and adaptability of your automation solutions.

8. Working with Arrays:

  • Harness the capabilities of arrays in Bash scripting, a key data structure for managing and processing collections of data.

9. Practical Application and Real-World Scenarios:

  • Apply your newfound skills to real-world scenarios, combining all the elements learned throughout the course. From system administration tasks to workflow optimizations, you'll gain practical experience.

10. Quiz Challenges:

  • Each section concludes with quiz challenges to reinforce your understanding and ensure that you can confidently apply the concepts learned.

By the end of this course, you'll emerge with the confidence and expertise to write efficient Bash scripts, automate tasks, and navigate the command line with ease. Join us on this exciting journey, and let's script your success together!
targetAudiences: Beginners in Programming.
System Administrators.

Course Full Description and Welcome Letter:

Hello everyone and welcome to the online-course created for any current or potential corporate managers from junior to executive level, that will make you stand out from the others.

This course might become your first step to acquire skill set, knowledges and maybe even a whole new profession, that is appearing right now. Learning it today, gives you advantages tomorrow!

I’m talking about digital transformation. In terms of customer communications in basically any meduim or big enterprises. And for small businesses, the most succesfull ones, they are already doing it in a modern way from the first day.

This transformation - it is a moving away from old way of communications, like phone calls, email, or even fax - to new way - whatsapp, facebook messenger, instagram direct messages, telegram - any messaging apps that people are using in their everyday life. And now they are starting to usу it to talk to businesses. To chat with an online store, with a bank, medical clinic - with any organization out there.

And here lies the opportunity!

All of these companies need employees or contractors who understand how to make this shift, this transition. New channels on the one hand bring a lot of new possibilities, such as chatbots and artificial intelligence, and on the other hand, require a rebuilding of current business workflows.

For example agent’s KPI in a contact centre based on whatsapp, is very different from a voice-based CC. And somebody need to know how to deal with it.

But the contact center is not the only place where apps like whatsapp are taking over. It affects pretty much every customer related departpent: sales, marketing and loyalty, support, customer experience, automation and online services.

So, Whether you plan to tie your career or business entirely to this feild, this knowledge will help you achieve your professional goals in a variety of ways. Because communication - is the essential part of business.

I started this journey seven years ago, when it was hardly even existed. Since then, I have worked with some of the world's biggest clients, such as Societe Generale, British american tobacco and others. Now I’m a founder of a startup called brandy. im

I invite you to my course where you will learn the basics about communications of the future. Welcome!



Before we start I want to give a quick intro of myself and also let’s take a look on the course plan.

So without further ado, here is what we will discuss

The course consists of 2 parts:

In a first one, everything down lesson 4, we are talking about the key benefits for business in general.

And then learning the basics of chatbots and AI.

The second part is becoming more specific.

We will see how exactly it implies to different departments. Discuss business application of particular messaging channels.

And with all of that we are getting ready to meet the main framework –

of ideal customer journey in modern channels. Which will be useful tool to any of your further projects.

And briefly about me.

You can call me Slava. For a last 7 years I’ve been running chat platform startup. For these years we made a lot of stuff, worked with some worldwide clients.

We have become official provider of apple messages for business. Not sure if this is my most significant achievement, but personally, the most pleasant one. A chance to work directly with apple team is really cool

and I have been honoured to become one of the business experts at the Retail banking school, where we are right now.

Feel free to connect or ask me anything on linkedin.

And, let’s jump in!

So I hope this online course will be a good start on mastering this new world of digital communications and happier customers


Linked topics:

  • Business Fundamentals

  • Marketing & Business Strategy

  • Online and Digital Business

  • Digital transformations / Strategy

  • Product Management

  • Continuous Process Improvement

  • Business and Entrepreneurship Fundamentals

  • Digital Marketing

  • Sales Skills

  • B2B Sales

  • B2C Sales

  • Customer Relationship Management

courseDetails.title: Motivation et Équilibre Émotionnel : Crée ta Journée Parfait
courseDetails.shortDescription: Maîtrise le rééquilibrage émotionnel, crée ta journée parfaite, challenge-toi et vibre avec ta mission de vie
courseDetails.longDescription:
Transforme ta vie en créant l'équilibre parfait entre défis et épanouissement

Tu te sens parfois submergé par les moments difficiles au travail ? Tu cherches à retrouver cette étincelle qui te faisait vibrer chaque matin ? Ce cours est fait pour toi.

Pourquoi ce cours va transformer ta vie ?

Dans cette formation complète, tu vas découvrir comment créer une vie qui te fait vibrer au quotidien. Fini les lundis difficiles où tu traînes des pieds pour aller travailler. Tu vas apprendre à transformer ta motivation pour que chaque journée devienne aussi excitante qu'un vendredi soir.

Ce que tu vas apprendre :

Rééquilibrage d'activité : Découvre comment recadrer tes moments durs avec des moments joyeux. Mauvaise journée au bureau ? Tu apprendras à planifier stratégiquement des activités plaisantes (massage, cinéma, restaurant) pour rééquilibrer ton état émotionnel et maintenir ton bien-être.

Trouve ta mission et vibre : Apprends à te sentir porté par ce que tu réalises. Je vais te montrer comment identifier et créer des challenges intrinsèques qui transformeront radicalement ta motivation. Tu découvriras comment te sentir vivant à travers ta mission de vie.

Stimulation motivationnelle : Utilise du contenu puissant pour déclencher une énergie instoppable. Tu vas découvrir comment sélectionner et utiliser des contenus qui vont te sortir de tes tripes, te secouer et te faire dire "Qu'est-ce que je suis en train de faire ? Il faut que je me bouge !"

Gestion des émotions : Maîtrise tes émotions pour naviguer sereinement dans ta vie quotidienne. Tu apprendras des techniques concrètes pour gérer le stress, l'anxiété et les émotions négatives.

Crée ta journée parfaite : Apprends à designer ta journée idéale selon tes valeurs et tes aspirations. Je vais te guider pas à pas pour construire une routine qui te correspond vraiment.

Tire la chasse des pensées négatives : Libère-toi de ce qui ne te procure pas de plaisir. Tu vas apprendre à identifier et éliminer les idées toxiques qui sabotent ton bonheur.

À qui s'adresse ce cours ?

  • Aux employés de bureau qui veulent retrouver leur motivation

  • À ceux qui cherchent un meilleur équilibre de vie

  • Aux personnes qui veulent gérer leurs émotions efficacement

  • À tous ceux qui aspirent à vivre une vie plus épanouissante

Rejoins-moi maintenant et commence à créer la vie qui te fait vibrer !
targetAudiences: Les professionnels démotivés qui veulent retrouver l'énergie et l'enthousiasme dans leur quotidien
Les personnes qui cherchent à rééquilibrer leur vie émotionnelle entre moments difficiles et expériences positives
Ceux qui veulent se connecter à leur mission de vie et vibrer à nouveau avec ce qu'ils réalisent
Les individus qui ont besoin de booster leur motivation et de générer une énergie instoppable
Toute personne désireuse de maîtriser ses émotions et créer sa journée idéale

courseDetails.title: Mental de Champion transformer tes problèmes en opportunités
courseDetails.shortDescription: Libère-toi du cycle infernal des pensées négatives et transforme ta relation aux défis de la vie
courseDetails.longDescription:
Tu passes tes journées à ruminer tes problèmes ? Tu te sens complètement perdu quand quelque chose d'imprévu arrive ? Cette formation de plus d'une heure vingt va carrément changer ta façon de voir et de gérer les galères du quotidien.

Reprends le contrôle de ton mental et stop avec ces pensées pourries qui te bouffent la tête. Avec les techniques anti-rumination que tu vas apprendre, fini de tourner en boucle dans ta tête - tu vas enfin savoir comment couper court à tout ça.

Change ta façon de voir les choses et tu verras comme ta vie va se transformer. Au lieu de subir ce qui t'arrive, tu vas découvrir comment regarder les événements sous un autre angle pour y trouver de la force et des opportunités. Tu vas commencer à voir des solutions partout où tu ne voyais que des murs.

Apprends à gérer ce qui te tombe dessus sans paniquer ni te laisser déstabiliser. Tu vas développer des réflexes mentaux qui te permettront de transformer n'importe quel obstacle en quelque chose de positif pour toi.

Dans cette formation, je t'explique tout étape par étape, face caméra, comme si on était ensemble. Chaque concept est accompagné d'exemples concrets que tu peux appliquer dès maintenant dans ta vie.

Tu découvriras aussi pourquoi s'inquiéter ne sert strictement à rien et comment les gens qui réussissent gèrent vraiment leurs problèmes. Tu auras accès à des vidéos sur le bonheur authentique et ce qui fait qu'on peut vraiment profiter de la vie.

Après cette formation, tu ne subiras plus tes problèmes comme avant. Tu auras enfin tout ce qu'il faut pour reprendre le contrôle complet de ton mental.
targetAudiences: Tu rumines constamment - Tu passes tes nuits à ressasser tes problèmes, à analyser chaque situation sous tous les angles sans jamais trouver de solution
Tu te sens submergé(e) par les imprévus - Les changements soudains te paralysent et tu as l'impression de subir ta vie plutôt que de la diriger
Tu veux reprendre le contrôle de ton mental - Tu es fatigué(e) de tes pensées négatives automatiques et tu cherches des outils concrets pour changer ta perception
Tu aspires à une vision de vie plus large - Tu sens que tu te limites dans tes projets et tes ambitions à cause de tes peurs et de ton pessimisme
Tu cherches des résultats rapides et durables - Tu veux une méthode pratique, pas de la théorie abstraite, quelque chose que tu peux appliquer dès ce soir

courseDetails.title: Data Security in the age of Generative AI
courseDetails.shortDescription: Protect sensitive data, prevent AI misuse, master prompt security, and build responsible GenAI practices at work.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Are you excited about the power of Generative AI but worried about how to keep your company’s data safe while using it? Do you ever wonder what really happens when you paste information into ChatGPT, Copilot, or Gemini — and whether it’s truly secure?

If you work with AI tools and want to protect sensitive information, prevent data leaks, and build trustworthy AI workflows, this course is for you.

In today’s workplace, Generative AI can write, code, analyze, and automate — but every prompt you type and every output you share can carry hidden risks. This course will help you bridge the gap between AI productivity and data protection, so you can confidently use Generative AI without crossing security or compliance lines.

What makes this course unique

Unlike typical AI safety overviews, this course combines real-world corporate examples, security workflows, and relatable case discussions that connect directly to the way professionals use AI every day. You will see how data actually moves through AI systems, where vulnerabilities appear, and what smart organizations do to close those gaps.

Through engaging video lectures and scenario-based quizzes, you will develop the mindset and habits to stay both productive and compliant in the AI era.

In this course, you will

  • Identify the trust gap between AI’s power and enterprise data restrictions.

  • Map the entire GenAI workflow — from training data to inference and outputs — to pinpoint where risks emerge.

  • Develop safe prompting and data-handling habits that prevent leaks and misuse.

  • Master prompt injection awareness — understanding how words themselves can become cyberattacks.

  • Apply practical defense methods like masking, anonymization, and the STOP audit technique.

  • Adopt a “Validate → Escalate → Approve” review framework to ensure all AI outputs remain accurate and compliant.

  • Recognize signs of suspicious AI behavior and apply real-life reporting practices.

  • Strengthen your organization’s defense with layered safeguards, workspace security, and responsible AI culture.

Why learn about Data Security in the Age of GenAI

Because every AI prompt is a potential data decision. Whether you are a manager, analyst, developer, HR professional, or consultant, your daily work likely involves interacting with GenAI tools. Understanding how to use them safely is no longer optional — it is a core digital skill for the future of work.

This course shows you how to balance innovation with control, helping you protect not just data but also trust, reputation, and compliance within your organization.

Take the next step

If you are ready to use Generative AI responsibly without putting your company, clients, or yourself at risk, this course will give you the framework, confidence, and habits to do it right.

Enroll now and become part of the new generation of AI-powered professionals who know how to protect data in the age of GenAI.

courseDetails.title: Mit Online Marketing Dein Business aufbauen ohne Vorwissen!
courseDetails.shortDescription: Nutze Digital Marketing und Online Marketing, um Deine Online Umsätze zu vervielfachen - auch ganz ohne Vorwissen!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Digitales Marketing und insbesondere Online Marketing boomen!

Es herrscht eine Goldgräberstimmung, und genau JETZT hat es Sinn, sich mit Online Marketing auseinanderzusetzen - bevor es zu spät ist.

Besonders jetzt, im Jahr 2023/2024 explodiert der Online Traffic und die Werbepreise gehen herunter.

Der Einzelhandel, Unternehmer und Selbständige sind aufgrund der aktuellen Lage gezwungen, ihre Produkte immer mehr online zu verkaufen - und kaum jemand ist wirklich darauf vorbereitet.

Das Rennen hat offiziell begonnen, und wer sich JETZT mit Online-Marketing beschäftigt, hat noch eine Chance, vorne mit dabei zu sein.

Woran liegt das?

In den letzten 3-4 Jahren hat sich eine Art Onlinemarketing-Hype entwickelt mit internationalen und deutschen Experten, die sehr viel Ahnung haben von E-Mail-Marketing, Leads, Funneln, Conversions und so weiter.

Jedoch hat dieses Wissen bisher kaum den Sprung von den Online-Marketing-Experten (die bisher weitgehend unter sich bleiben und sich untereinander Coachings verkaufen) in die echte Offline-Welt geschafft.

Und genau das ist die Chance, JETZT mit Digitalem Marketing / Online-Marketing anzufangen.


Lerne, die wichtigsten Grundlagen und Begriffe des Online Marketing - damit wirst Dir viele Verständnisprobleme und Ärger ersparen!

Die folgenden Fragen werden Dir als Erstes im Kurs beantwortet:

  • Was ist Digitales Marketing, und was ist Online Marketing?

  • Was bedeutet Lead und Leadmagnet?

  • Wie funktioniert ein Sales Funnel?

  • Was ist der Unterschied zwischen Zielgruppe und Kunden-Avatar?

  • Nach welchem Prinzip funktioniert Affiliate Marketing?


Danach werden wir die Ziele und das "Why" Deines Online-Business erarbeiten - damit wirst Du viel Zeit sparen, da Du danach in die RICHTIGE Richtung gehst.

  • Wir werden erarbeiten, was dein "Warum" ist (mit Hilfe eines PDF Worksheets zum Download)

  • Du wirst lernen, wie Du Deine Marke und Dein Business positionierst mit dem "Positioning Statement".

  • Du wirst den Zweck einer USP (Unique Selling Proposition) kennenlernen und eine USP für Dich im Kurs erstellen.

  • Außerdem wirst du verstehen, wie Du die Außendarstellung Deiner Persönlichkeit "formst".

  • Wir werden herausarbeiten, wo Deine Zielgruppe sich aufhält.


Du wirst lernen, wie Du in Windeseile eine eigene Webseite für Dein Business erstellst - damit sicherst Du Dir einen professionellen Auftritt und bist nicht abhängig von teuren Agenturen.

  • Du wirst den Unterschied und sie Einsatzzwecke von WordPress, Wix, Leadpages und Click Funnels kennenlernen.

  • Wir werden gemeinsam im Kurs eine Domain aussuchen.

  • Du wirst sehen, wie wichtig die Wahl des Hosting Providers ist - und welchen Du nehmen musst (Geschwindigkeit!)

  • Ich zeige Dir den optimalen Page Builder (Webseiten Erstellung inkl. Templates für Online Marketing Funnel)

  • Du wirst sehr viel Zeit sparen, indem Du sofort lernst, wie Du einen Double Opt-in Prozess anlegst und testest.


Leads sind das Allerwichtigste im Online Marketing - damit Dir nicht irgendwann der Boden unter den Füßen weggezogen wird (z.B. wenn ein Social Media Konto gesperrt wird), lernst Du in diesem Kurs auch professionelles E-Mail-Marketing.

  • Du lernst die wichtigsten E-Mail-Marketing Anbieter im deutschsprachigen Raum kennen.

  • Du wirst den Unterschied zwischen E-Mail Kampagnen und Newslettern kennenlernen.

  • Du wirst verstehen, warum Tag-basiertes Marketing dem listenbasierten E-Mail Marketing haushoch überlegen ist.

  • Wir legen eine komplette Landing Page an inkl. technischer Anbindung - allein das spart Dir monatelanges Herumprobieren oder mehrere Tausend Euro für eine Agentur.

  • Am Ende des Kurses wirst Du Profi in BEIDEN Tools sein und somit sogar in der Lage sein, für Deine eigenen Kunden zu einem hohen Stundensatz E-Mail-Kampagnen anzulegen!


Also worauf wartest Du noch? Schreibe Dich jetzt sofort ein und lerne, wie Du ein erfolgreiches Online Business aufbaust in 14 Tagen - selbst als völliger Anfänger ganz ohne Vorwissen!

Wichtige Info: Als Gründungsmitglied dieses Kurses bekommst Du laufend gratis Updates.
targetAudiences: Jeder, der sich für Online Marketing / Digitales Marketing interessiert
Jeder, der die Grundbegriffe des Online Marketing nachhaltig verstehen möchte
Unternehmer und Solopreneure, die Digitales Marketing anhand von echten Beispielen lernen möchten.

courseDetails.title: ١٥ - ١٦ - إدارة قنوات التسویق والتجزئة
courseDetails.shortDescription: لحظة الحقيقة عند الوصول للعميل
courseDetails.longDescription:
ما هو نظام القنوات التسويقية؟ وما المقصود بشبكة القيمة؟ وما الوظائف الأساسية التي تؤديها هذه القنوات؟
في الكورس الأول من هذه المجموعة، سنسلّط الضوء على واحد من أهم الجوانب العملية في علم التسويق: القنوات التسويقية (Marketing Channels)، ودورها المحوري في نقل القيمة من الشركة إلى العميل.

سنتناول بالتفصيل:

· كيفية تصميم القنوات التسويقية وتخطيطها بشكل استراتيجي.

· القرارات التي يجب على الشركة اتخاذها لإدارة هذه القنوات بكفاءة.

· كيف يمكن للشركات تحقيق تكامل وتناغم بين مختلف القنوات التسويقية وإدارتها بصورة فعالة لتعزيز تجربة العميل وزيادة العائد.

كما سنناقش المفاهيم المرتبطة بالتجارة الإلكترونية (E-Commerce)، والتجارة عبر الهواتف المحمولة (M-Commerce)، والأسس التي يقوم عليها نجاح هذه القنوات في العصر الرقمي.

التركيز الأكبر في الكورس الثاني من هذه المجموعة سيكون على قنوات البيع، وعلى وجه الخصوص: قنوات التجزئة (Retailing)، باعتبارها نقطة الاتصال المباشرة مع المستهلك النهائي.
فهي تمثّل "لحظة الحقيقة"، المرحلة التي تظهر فيها نتائج كافة جهود التسويق والتخطيط الاستراتيجي.
في هذه اللحظة، يتم البيع الفعلي، وتتحدد الأسعار، ودرجة التنافس، وموقع العلامة التجارية في ذهن العميل.

سنتعرّف على تطوّر التجزئة الحديثة وكيف أسهمت التكنولوجيا في تعزيز تجربة المستهلك، وزيادة المبيعات والربحية، رغم التحديات التي يشهدها قطاع التجزئة عالميًا بسبب عوامل اقتصادية وسلوكية وتقنية متنوعة.

كما سنناقش:

· دور التسويق في تعزيز التميز عند نقطة الالتقاء مع العميل.

· مفهوم العلامات الخاصة (Private Labels) التي تصنعها المتاجر لحسابها.

· تجارة الجملة، ودورها في سلسلة التوزيع.

· الأسس الحديثة في اللوجستيات وكيفية إدارتها بكفاءة لخلق ميزة تنافسية.

هذا الكورس يُعد مرجعًا مهمًا لأي شخص يعمل في التسويق، المبيعات، التوزيع، أو إدارة المنتجات، لأنه يُقدّم تصورًا عمليًا متكاملًا حول كيفية إيصال القيمة للعميل من خلال قنوات بيع فعّالة ومتكاملة.


هذه هي الدورات رقم (١٥ – ١٦) من أصل 20 دورة في دبلومة "التسويق الشامل"، يمكنك الإشتراك في هذا الكورس أو الإستفادة بسعر مخفض على الدبلومة المتكاملة (٢٠ كورس) بسعر مخفض جداً



محتويات الكورس رقم ١٥ (الأول من هذه المجموعة):



  1. Marketing Channels and Value Networks القنوات التسويقية وشبكات القيمة

  2. The Role of Marketing Channels دور القنوات التسويقية

  3. Channel-Design تصميم القناة التسويقية

  4. Channel-Management Decisions قرارات إدارة القناة

  5. Channel Integration and Systems تكامل القناة والأنظمة

  6. Conflict, Cooperation, and Competition التعارض والتعاون والمنافسة


محتويات الكورس رقم ١٦ (الثاني من هذه المجموعة):




  1. The Modern Retail Environment منظومة التجزئة الحديثة

  2. Key Retailing Decisions القرارات الرئيسية في عملية التجزئة

  3. Managing Omnichannel Retailing إدارة القنوات المتعددة للتجزئة

  4. Managing Private Labels إدارة العلامات التجارية الخاصة

  5. Wholesaling تجارة الجملة

  6. Case Study – UNIQLO دراسة حالة عن براند يوني كلو
targetAudiences: كل طلبة التسويق اللي محتاجين منهج شامل ومفصل مدعوم بالخبرة العملية ... كل العاملين في مجال التسويق .. كل أصحاب الشركات ورواد الأعمال وأصحاب المشاريع ... كل اللي مهتم بالمبيعات ... وكل اللي مهتم إنه يغير مساره الوظيفي.

This course assumes you have NO prior knowledge in hacking and cracking, and by the end of it, you'll be at a comfortable level, being able to crack the office file's passwords and secure them like security experts!

This course is highly focused on practical password cracking. You will be able to crack office passwords with CPU and GPU-based attacks from Kali Linux as well as Windows Machine. you'll learn everything by example and practical guides,  so we'll never have any dry boring theoretical lectures.

Each practical lecture is accompanied by a free pdf presentation explaining the attack which can be downloaded and used as a quick reference.

After finishing this course you will also be acquainted with the best free password cracking tools and techniques that you can implement in your future learning path. We also discuss some services and tools that can help you to speed up the office password cracking process.

The Quick Breakdown of the course content is as follows:-

  • How to Install Kali Linux in a virtual environment in a quick and easy way.

  • How to password protect word, excel and PowerPoint Files.

  • How to use John to crack office passwords on Kali Linux.

  • How to use Hashcat for faster GPU-based Attacks.

  • How to install John the ripper and Hashcat on Windows.

  • How to crack office passwords from Windows without Kali Linux.

  • How to Unlock read-only Excel Files.

  • How to remove sheet and workbook protection from Excel sheets.

  • How to remove read-only restriction from Word and PowerPoint files.

  • How to remove passwords from office documents with free online password recovery service.

  • How to use Paid tools to crack office passwords.

  • How to remove passwords from very old word documents with Guaword utility.

Notes:

  • This course is created for educational purposes only and all the attacks are launched in my own lab or against systems that I have permission to test. The instructor is not linked to any tool or service mentioned in the course in any capacity.
